original_text: You must not turn away from him to join with the other nations that still live near you. Do not marry any of them. Do not live in the way that they live.
korean_text: 너희가 만일 돌아서서 너희 중에 남아 있는 이 민족들을 가까이 하여 더불어 혼인하며 서로 왕래하면

sentences.original_text: You must not turn away from him
to join with the other nations
Do not marry any of them
Do not live in the way that they live
